name: dashboard-structure
description: A Proposed Conceptual Structure For Dashboard Project
author: hilo2120

scripts.pull-deps:components: git subtree pull --prefix packages/components/ https://repo-path.git main
scripts.pull-deps:apis: git subtree pull --prefix packages/apis/ https://repo-path.git main
scripts.pull-deps:config: git subtree pull --prefix packages/config/ https://repo-path.git main
scripts.pull-deps:icons: git subtree pull --prefix packages/icons/ https://repo-path.git main
scripts.pull-deps:utils: git subtree pull --prefix packages/utils/ https://repo-path.git main
